participant_id.Description: Unique identifier for each participant in the form sub-<label>

age.Notes: For participants aged 89 or higher, age should be recorded as 89+

sex.Description: Sex of the participant as reported by the participant

language.Description: Primary language spoken by the participant

Levels.Other: Other languages as specified by the participant

consent_status.Description: Status of participant's consent for the study

is_feasibility_participant.Description: Indicates whether the participant is part of the feasibility study

Levels.yes: Participant is part of the feasibility study
Levels.no: Participant is not part of the feasibility study

enrollment_institution.Description: Institution where the participant was enrolled

eligible_studies.Description: Studies the participant is eligible for

Levels.Voice Disorders: Participant eligible for studies on voice disorders
Levels.Neurological and Neurodegenerative Disor: Participant eligible for studies on neurological and neurodegenerative disorders
Levels.Mood and Psychiatric Disorders: Participant eligible for studies on mood and psychiatric disorders
Levels.Respiratory Disorders: Participant eligible for studies on respiratory disorders
Levels.Pediatric Disorders: Participant eligible for studies on pediatric disorders

is_control_participant.Description: Indicates whether the participant is a control participant

laryngeal_conditions.Description: Indicates if the participant has any laryngeal conditions

Levels.lesions of the vocal cord: Lesions of the vocal cord (nodule, polyp, cyst)

neurological_conditions.Description: Indicates if the participant has any neurological or neurodegenerative conditions

Levels.alzheimer's disease: Alzheimer's, dementia, or mild cognitive impairment

psychiatric_conditions.Description: Indicates if the participant has any psychiatric conditions

respiratory_conditions.Description: Indicates if the participant has any respiratory conditions

Levels.airway stenosis: Airway stenosis (e.g., bilateral vocal fold paralysis; laryngeal stenosis)

pediatric_conditions.Description: Indicates if the participant has any pediatric conditions

vision_related_requirements.Description: Indicates if the participant has any vision-related requirements

Levels.change font size: Participant prefers a different font size
Levels.person to read text: Participant requires a person to read the text

hearing_related_requirements.Description: Indicates if the participant has any hearing-related requirements

Levels.use haptic feedback: Participant prefers haptic feedback instead of audio cues

physical_challenges.Description: Indicates if the participant has any physical challenges related to touchscreen navigation

Levels.alternative keyboard: Participant prefers to connect an alternative keyboard
Levels.navigate by voice commands: Participant prefers to navigate using voice commands

cognitive_challenges.Description: Indicates if the participant has any cognitive challenges including difficulty reading

Levels.person to read text: Participant prefers a person to read the text
Levels.speak answers: Participant prefers to speak answers instead of typing

smoking_history.Description: Indicates if the participant has a history of smoking

Levels.prefer not to answer: Participant prefers not to disclose smoking history

alcohol_use.Description: Indicates if the participant consumes alcohol

Levels.prefer not to answer: Participant prefers not to disclose alcohol use

employment_status.Description: Indicates the employment status of the participant

Levels.employed, multiple part time jobs: Participant has multiple part time jobs
Levels.other: Other employment status as specified by the participant

marital_status.Description: Indicates the marital status of the participant

primary_mode_of_transportation.Description: Indicates the participant's primary mode of transportation

Levels.other: Other mode of transportation as specified by the participant

housing_status.Description: Indicates the housing status of the participant

Levels.other: Other housing status as specified by the participant

income_level.Description: Indicates the income level of the participant
income_level.Notes: Participants should report their total household income from all sources
